Project Overview

Yerbanado needed an informational website that would allow their authors to easily upload blog pieces. We decided Wordpress would be the best solution for their needs.

In collaboration with Yerbanado's CEO and Creative Director, I designed and developed a responsive Wordpress website utilizing the company's color scheme and images. The focus of the website is to share their extensive knowledge of alternative medicine and to promote Yerbanado events (Yerbanado Experience).

Role Front-End Designer | UX/UI

Tools HTML5 | CSS3 | Wordpress | PHP | JavaScript

When October 2016
